snippet: Barbara Corcoran is founder of the Corcoran Group and now a consultant, as well as a regular on ABC’s “Shark Tank.” She once found herself in Syracuse, after bolting to the wrong gate.
abstract: Frequent Flier column features Corcoran Group founder and consultant Barbara Corcoran discussing her flying experiences.
lead_paragraph: Barbara Corcoran is founder of the Corcoran Group and now a consultant, as well as a regular on ABC’s “Shark Tank.” She once found herself in Syracuse, after bolting to the wrong gate.

headline.seo: How I Made the Flight but Missed the Airport - Frequent Flier
headline.main: Making the Flight, Missing the Airport
headline.print_headline: Making the Flight, Missing the Airport
